site_name: St Richard Reynolds Catholic College Clifden RoadTwickenhamTW1 4LT
description: T1 - Lime - Lift to 5m, reduce overextended southern limb by 2mT2 - Lime - Reduce limbs with included unions at 6 & 4m by 2.5mT3 - Horse Chestnut - Lift to 5mT4 - London Plane - Crown lift to 5m, reduce overextended limb over the play area by 2.5-3mT5 - Chestnut - Reduce 2 dominant limbs over parking area by 2mT6 - Purple Plum - Thin crown by 20% & lift to 3mT7 - Red Horse Chestnut - Prune to clear street light by 1.5mT10 - Horse Chestnut - Lift to 5mT11 - London Plane - Crown lift to 6m, Reduce 3x overextended limbs over play area by 2.5-3mT12 - Lime - Thin canopy 20%T13 - Lime - Lift to 6m over roadT14 - Horse Chestnut - Lift to 6m over road and reduce canopy by 2-2.5m T15 - Lime Crown - Lift to 5m over road and reduce limb at 7m by 2-3m over roadT17 - Lime - Remove epicormic growth on main stemT18 - Lime - Thin crown by 20%T19 - Lime - Reduce crown by 3m, prune to clear telephone wiresT20 - Lime - Crown thin 20%, prune to clear the telephone wiresT21 - Lime - Crown thin 20%, prune to clear the telephone wiresT22 - Lime - Crown thin 20%, prune to clear the telephone wiresT23 - Lime - Prune to clear the telephone wires by 5mT24 - Lime - Remove epicormic growth on main stemT25 - Lime - Remove basal and epicormic growth, prune to clear telephone wires and building by 2m, crown lift to 4.5mT26 - Lime - Reduce canopy by 3mT27 - Lime - Reduce canopy by 3m, thin remaining canopy 20% & lift to 6m over roadT28 - Lime - Reduce canopy by 2.5m & remove epicormic on the main stemT29 - Lime - Lift to 6m & remove the epicormic on the main stemT30 - Plane - Lift to 5mT32-T35 - Lime - Re-pollard at historical pointsT37 - Pine - Prune back to clear the building by 1mT40 - Gingko - Reduce stem with included union by 1.5mT45 - Yew - Prune to clear the building by 50cm and lift to 2m over footpathT48 - Magnolia - Lift to 2m over footpathT50 - Cherry - Lift to 3m
